column2: Leaf Group Ltd. engages in creating brands for lifestyle categories, including art and design, fitness and wellness, and home and decor. The company is headquartered in Santa Monica, California and currently employs 346 full-time employees. The firm has online media properties and marketplace platforms that enable communities of creators to reach audiences in lifestyle categories. The firm operates an online studio platform for the professional creation and distribution of content, as well as two online artist marketplaces. Its business comprises two service offerings: Content & Media and Marketplaces. The firm creates media content, including text articles, videos, photographs and designed visual formats, and publishes such content to its owned and operated online properties and to its customers' online properties. The firm also offers its content creation and distribution platform to provide custom content and other content marketing solutions to brands, publishers and advertisers.
